ImyaTweaks.Title: Turn on or off entire Features of the mod. Use the panels below to further fine tune your experience.
ImyaTweaks.Description: Switch all the Toggles to 'on' to get the full experience. By default, all modules are enabled!

ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the Clay Collector is present in the Old World. [Default = on]

Standard.Name: Unlock River Fishery OW Building Category

ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Fishery is present in the Old World. [Default = on]

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable River Flour Mill in OW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Flour Mill is present in the Old World. [Default = on]

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable River Saw Mill in OW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Saw Mill is present in the Old World. [Default = on]

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable River Power Station in OW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Power Station is present in the Old World. [Default = on]

Standard.Name: OW Hacienda Modern Pump House Workarea
Unlock River Waterpump OW Creative Mode

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable River Water Pump in OW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Water Pump is present in the Old World. [Default = on]

Standard.Name: Unlock River Sandmine OW Creative Mode

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable River Sand Mine in OW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Sand Mine is present in the Old World. [Default = on]

Standard.Name: Unlock River Papermill OW Creative Mode

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable River Paper Mill in OW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Paper Mill is present in the Old World. [Default = on]

Standard.Name: fish chain Jakob shared goods compatibility
construction category all OW river Slot buildings

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable Vanilla Build Menu Entries for River Slot Buildings OW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the OW River Slot Buildings apear in the normal production chains [Default = off, might not be compatibile with all mods]

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable separate Menu Entry for River Slot Buildings OW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the OW River Slot Buildings apear in a separate build menu entry [Default = on, compatibile with all mods]

Standard.Name: Unlock River Buildings OW Creative Mode
